channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan's Former President Ma Ying-jeou Meets Xi Jinping in Beijing
item.description: Taiwan's former President Ma Ying-jeou has met with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing, the second meeting between the two men following a summit in Singapore in 2015, when Ma

item.title: Ma and Xi Discuss Cross-Strait Exchanges in Beijing
item.description: Taiwanâ€™s former President Ma Ying-jeou has finally met with Chinese President Xi Jinping in Beijing, marking a historic second meeting between the two men.

item.title: Senior Diplomat says U.S. Determined to Keep Peace in Taiwan Strait
item.description: A senior U.S. diplomat has reiterated support for Taiwan, saying his country is determined to maintain peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait.

item.title: Military Conducts Anti-Air Missile Drills in Taiwan's South
item.description: Taiwan's military is conducting its regular "Divine Bow" anti-air missile drills in Pingtung County. Soldiers are trained to locate, take aim and fire at a target within 10 seconds
